paragraph.paragraph:
Project nodes have a context menu accessible by right clicking on the folder. The available items are as follows:
Note: Project context menus are subject to change base on installed third party add-ins and packages. The context menu items cover here are those that will be available in the standard edition of Visual Studio .NET with no other add-ins or packages installed, with the exception of EiffelEnvision.

Build
Incrementally ../../compiling_projects/compiling_projects.xmlBuilds the selected EiffelEnvision project.

Rebuild
Incrementally ../../compiling_projects/compiling_projects.xmlRebuilds the selected EiffelEnvision project from scratch.

Clean
Removes all compile-time information and any binaries created in previous ../../compiling_projects/compiling_projects.xmlBuilds. For more information see ../../compiling_projects/compiling_projects.xmlCompiling Projects.

Project Only, Generate Documentation
Generated the Eiffel HTML documentation for the selected EiffelEnvision project. For more information on documenting projects, see ../../documenting.xmlDocumenting Projects.

Add
This menu item is another submenu. See the below section on context_menu.xmladd_submenuAdd Submenu. All actions perform on the Add submenu will act as if they were executed on the project_items/project_items.xmlProject Items Folder. This is because no other folders or items can be added under an EiffelEnvision project.xmlProject node.

Add Reference
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/urfAddReferenceDialogBox.htmAdd Reference Dialog Box to permit adding of project references.

Save <Project Name>
Saves any changes to the project in the EiffelEnvision project file associated with the project.

Remove
Removes the EiffelEnvision project from the active ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution.

Rename
Displays an editable box permitting the renaming of the project. Once changed the project name in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer will be update and the EiffelEnvision project files renamed.

Properties
Displays the ../../configuring/project_configuration/index.xmlProject Configuration Property pages dialog box.

Add New Item...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box where you can select the EiffelEnvision ../../configuration/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates to add to your project. For more information on adding new items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Existing Item...
Adds an existing item under the Project Items folder. For more information on adding existing items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_existing_items.xmlAdding Existing Items.

New Folder
Adds a new cluster_folder.xmlCluster Folder under the Project Items folder. A new folder will also be created on disk at the project's location. For more information on adding new folders, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_folders.xmlAdding New Folders.

Add New Cluster...
Adds a new explicit_cluster.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder under the Project Items folder. For more information on adding new clusters, see ../../configuration/adding_items/adding_clusters.xmlAdding New Clusters.

Add Windows Form...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Windows Form project item selected. For more information see ../../configuration/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add User Control...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision User Control project item selected. For more information see ../../configuration/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Web Service...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Web Service Class project item selected. For more information see ../../configuration/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Component...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Component project item selected. For more information see ../../configuration/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Class...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Class project item selected. For more information see ../../configuration/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Resource...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Assembly Resource project item selected. For more information see ../../configuration/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.
